title: Full-Stack Web Development Trainee
description: Actively building real-world applications using modern web technologies. Completed several hands-on projects focused on frontend and backend development. Gained strong understanding of Git workflows, API design, database integration, and responsive UI development.

title: React Portfolio Website
description: Built a responsive, single-page React application to showcase skills and projects. Used JSON for data structure and pure CSS for styling. Designed and implemented a dynamic portfolio layout featuring sections like Hero, About, Projects, and Contact.

title: Blog API with Authentication
description: Developed a RESTful API for a blog platform with user authentication, password reset via email, and CRUD functionality. Applied layered architecture with controllers, services, and custom error handling. Integrated PostgreSQL and email sending with Nodemailer.

title: Library Management System (OOP Practice)
description: Created a library system to manage books and users using TypeScript classes. Demonstrated object-oriented design principles like encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism.

title: Inventory Management System
description: Designed an inventory tracker using class-based TypeScript to manage stock levels and product data. Applied interface-based design for flexibility and clean separation of logic.

title: Content Creator (Tech Niche - UK TikTok Region)
description: Built engaging content with consistent visuals and voice targeting UK-region TikTok users. Developed strategic planning skills and digital creativity. Experimenting with different formats and ideas to grow audience and improve reach.
